verses.verse: וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> heard בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son שָׁא֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> And when Saul's כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for מֵ֤ת <S%H4191><s%> was dead אַבְנֵר֙ <S%H74><s%> that Abner בְּחֶבְר֔וֹן <S%H2275><s%> in Hebron וַיִּרְפּ֖וּ <S%H7503><s%> were feeble יָדָ֑יו <S%H3027><s%> his hands וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> and all the Israelites נִבְהָֽלוּ׃ <S%H926><s%> were troubled

וּשְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> two אֲנָשִׁ֣ים <S%H376><s%> men שָׂרֵֽי־ <S%H8269><s%> [that were] captains גְדוּדִ֣ים <S%H1416><s%> of bands הָי֪וּ <S%H1961><s%> had בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> son שָׁא֟וּל <S%H7586><s%> And Saul's שֵׁם֩ <S%H8034><s%> the name הָאֶחָ֨ד <S%H259><s%> of the one בַּֽעֲנָ֜ה <S%H1196><s%> [was] Baanah וְשֵׁ֧ם <S%H8034><s%> and the name הַשֵּׁנִ֣י <S%H8145><s%> of the other רֵכָ֗ב <S%H7394><s%> Rechab בְּנֵ֛י <S%H1121><s%> the sons רִמּ֥וֹן <S%H7417><s%> of Rimmon הַבְּאֶֽרֹתִ֖י <S%H886><s%> a Beerothite מִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children בִנְיָמִ֑ן <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> is also בְּאֵר֔וֹת <S%H881><s%> (for Beeroth תֵּחָשֵׁ֖ב <S%H2803><s%> also was reckoned עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> of בִּנְיָמִֽן׃ <S%H1144><s%> to Benjamin

וַיִּבְרְח֥וּ <S%H1272><s%> fled הַבְּאֵרֹתִ֖ים <S%H886><s%> And the Beerothites גִּתָּ֑יְמָה <S%H1664><s%> to Gittaim וַֽיִּהְיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> been שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> there גָּרִ֔ים <S%H1481><s%> and were sojourners עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> until הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> age הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this ס

וְלִיהֽוֹנָתָן֙ <S%H3083><s%> And Jonathan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul's בֵּ֖ן <S%H1121><s%> had a son נְכֵ֣ה <S%H5223><s%> [that was] lame רַגְלָ֑יִם <S%H7272><s%> of [his] feet בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old חָמֵ֣שׁ <S%H2568><s%> He was five שָׁנִ֣ים <S%H8141><s%> years הָיָ֡ה <S%H1961><s%> happened בְּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> came שְׁמֻעַת֩ <S%H8052><s%> when the tidings שָׁא֨וּל <S%H7586><s%> of Saul וִיהֽוֹנָתָ֜ן <S%H3083><s%> and Jonathan מִֽיִּזְרְעֶ֗אל <S%H3157><s%> out of Jezreel וַתִּשָּׂאֵ֤הוּ <S%H5375><s%> took him up אֹֽמַנְתּוֹ֙ <S%H539><s%> and his nurse וַתָּנֹ֔ס <S%H5127><s%> and fled וַיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> happened בְּחָפְזָ֥הּ <S%H2648><s%> and it came to pass as she made haste לָנ֛וּס <S%H5127><s%> to flee וַיִּפֹּ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> that he fell וַיִּפָּסֵ֖חַ <S%H6452><s%> and became lame וּשְׁמ֥וֹ <S%H8034><s%> And his name מְפִיבֹֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H4648><s%> [was] Mephibosheth

וַיֵּ֨לְכ֜וּ <S%H1980><s%> departed בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the sons רִמּ֤וֹן <S%H7417><s%> of Rimmon הַבְּאֵֽרֹתִי֙ <S%H886><s%> the Beerothite רֵכָ֣ב <S%H7394><s%> Rechab וּבַעֲנָ֔ה <S%H1196><s%> and Baanah וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> and came כְּחֹ֣ם <S%H2527><s%> about the heat הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> of the day אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בֵּ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> to the house אִ֣ישׁ בֹּ֑שֶׁת <S%H378><s%> of Ishbosheth וְה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he שֹׁכֵ֔ב <S%H7901><s%> who lay אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁכַּ֥ב <S%H4904><s%> on a bed הַֽצָּהֳרָֽיִם׃ <S%H6672><s%> at noon

וְ֠הֵנָּה <S%H2007><s%> in בָּ֜אוּ <S%H935><s%> And they came thither עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against תּ֤וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> into the midst הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <S%H1004><s%> of the house לֹקְחֵ֣י <S%H3947><s%> [as though] they would have fetched חִטִּ֔ים <S%H2406><s%> wheat וַיַּכֻּ֖הוּ <S%H5221><s%> and they smote אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in הַחֹ֑מֶשׁ <S%H2570><s%> him under the fifth וְרֵכָ֛ב <S%H7394><s%> [rib] and Rechab וּבַעֲנָ֥ה <S%H1196><s%> and Baanah אָחִ֖יו <S%H251><s%> his brother נִמְלָֽטוּ׃ <S%H4422><s%> escaped

וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> For when they came הַבַּ֗יִת <S%H1004><s%> into the house וְהֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> he שֹׁכֵ֤ב <S%H7901><s%> he lay עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on מִטָּתוֹ֙ <S%H4296><s%> on his bed בַּחֲדַ֣ר <S%H2315><s%> chamber מִשְׁכָּב֔וֹ <S%H4904><s%> bed וַיַּכֻּ֙הוּ֙ <S%H5221><s%> and they smote וַיְמִתֻ֔הוּ <S%H4191><s%> him and slew וַיָּסִ֖ירוּ <S%H5493><s%> him and beheaded אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֹאשׁ֑וֹ <S%H7218><s%> his head וַיִּקְחוּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> him and took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֹאשׁ֔וֹ <S%H7218><s%> his head וַיֵּֽלְכ֛וּ <S%H1980><s%> and traveled דֶּ֥רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> through הָעֲרָבָ֖ה <S%H6160><s%> the plain כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַלָּֽיְלָה׃ <S%H3915><s%> all night

וַ֠יָּבִאוּ <S%H935><s%> And they brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֹ֨אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> the head אִֽישׁ־ בֹּ֥שֶׁת <S%H378><s%> of Ishbosheth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִד֮ <S%H1732><s%> unto David חֶבְרוֹן֒ <S%H2275><s%> to Hebron וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> and said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to the king הִנֵּֽה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> Behold the head אִֽישׁ־ בֹּ֗שֶׁת <S%H378><s%> of Ishbosheth בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> of Saul אֹֽיִבְךָ֔ <S%H341><s%> thine enemy אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who בִּקֵּ֖שׁ <S%H1245><s%> which sought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשֶׁ֑ךָ <S%H5315><s%> thy life וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> hath יְ֠הוָה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD לַֽאדֹנִ֨י <S%H113><s%> my lord הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king נְקָמוֹת֙ <S%H5360><s%> avenged הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> this day הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this מִשָּׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> of Saul וּמִזַּרְעֽוֹ׃ <S%H2233><s%> and of his seed ס

וַיַּ֨עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered דָּוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> And David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֵכָ֣ב ׀ <S%H7394><s%> Rechab וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בַּעֲנָ֣ה <S%H1196><s%> and Baanah אָחִ֗יו <S%H251><s%> his brother בְּנֵ֛י <S%H1121><s%> the sons רִמּ֥וֹן <S%H7417><s%> of Rimmon הַבְּאֵֽרֹתִ֖י <S%H886><s%> the Beerothite וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said לָהֶ֑ם חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> liveth יְהוָ֕ה <S%H3068><s%> unto them [As] the LORD אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who פָּדָ֥ה <S%H6299><s%> who hath redeemed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשִׁ֖י <S%H5315><s%> my soul מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all צָרָֽה׃ <S%H6869><s%> out of all adversity

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> when הַמַּגִּיד֩ <S%H5046><s%> When one told לִ֨י לֵאמֹ֜ר <S%H559><s%> me saying הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold מֵ֣ת <S%H4191><s%> is dead שָׁא֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> Behold Saul וְהֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> he הָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become כִמְבַשֵּׂר֙ <S%H1319><s%> good tidings בְּעֵינָ֔יו <S%H5869><s%> thinking to have brought וָאֹחֲזָ֣ה <S%H270><s%> I took hold ב֔וֹ וָאֶהְרְגֵ֖הוּ <S%H2026><s%> of him and slew בְּצִֽקְלָ֑ג <S%H6860><s%> him in Ziklag אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which לְתִתִּי־ <S%H5414><s%> who [thought] that I would have given ל֖וֹ בְּשֹׂרָֽה׃ <S%H1309><s%> him a reward for his tidings

אַ֞ף <S%H637><s%> How כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> when אֲנָשִׁ֣ים <S%H376><s%> person רְשָׁעִ֗ים <S%H7563><s%> How much more when wicked הָרְג֧וּ <S%H2026><s%> have slain אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> man צַדִּ֛יק <S%H6662><s%> a righteous בְּבֵית֖וֹ <S%H1004><s%> in his own house עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on מִשְׁכָּב֑וֹ <S%H4904><s%> his bed וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> now הֲל֨וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not אֲבַקֵּ֤שׁ <S%H1245><s%> require אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּמוֹ֙ <S%H1818><s%> his blood מִיֶּדְכֶ֔ם <S%H3027><s%> of your hand וּבִעַרְתִּ֥י <S%H1197><s%> and take you away אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> common

וַיְצַו֩ <S%H6680><s%> commanded דָּוִ֨ד <S%H1732><s%> And David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנְּעָרִ֜ים <S%H5288><s%> his young men וַיַּהַרְג֗וּם <S%H2026><s%> and they slew וַֽיְקַצְּצ֤וּ <S%H7112><s%> them and cut off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְדֵיהֶם֙ <S%H3027><s%> their hands וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רַגְלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H7272><s%> and their feet וַיִּתְל֥וּ <S%H8518><s%> and hanged [them] up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> beside הַבְּרֵכָ֖ה <S%H1295><s%> over the pool בְּחֶבְר֑וֹן <S%H2275><s%> in Hebron וְאֵ֨ת <S%H853><s%> רֹ֤אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> the head אִֽישׁ־ בֹּ֙שֶׁת֙ <S%H378><s%> of Ishbosheth לָקָ֔חוּ <S%H3947><s%> But they took וַיִּקְבְּר֥וּ <S%H6912><s%> and buried בְקֶֽבֶר־ <S%H6913><s%> [it] in the sepulchre אַבְנֵ֖ר <S%H74><s%> of Abner בְּחֶבְרֽוֹן׃ <S%H2275><s%> in Hebron פ
